description: Users are experiencing connectivity issues with third-party VPN clients, specifically Cisco AnyConnect, as well as with the built-in Windows VPN connections. The inability to establish a VPN connection is impacting users' access to necessary resources, which may include confidential or proprietary information. This issue could lead to disruptions in daily operations, particularly for businesses relying on secure remote access to their networks. As a result, IT administrators may need to troubleshoot these connection issues to mitigate any potential risk to business operations. This problem does not have a documented KB Article ID associated with it.
